page.title: 04Opinions of Tiptree
page.content: ON JULY 3RD SARAH AND I WENT TO THE CO-OP CENTRE.WHICH IS ABOUT TWO THIRDS UP CHURCH ROAD.WE ASKED SEVENTEEN PEOPLE FOUR QUESTIONS.ONE QUESTION WAS :- WHAT DO YOU THINK THE POPULATION OF TIPTREE IS? MOST PEOPLE SAID WAS BETWEEN SIX AND NINE THOUSAND.WHEN WE ASKED THEM DO YOU THINK ANYTHING HAS CHANGED IN TIPREE THE ANSWERS WERE YES.THEN WE ASKED HAVE YOU LIVED HERE LONG AND THE ANSWERS WERE BETWEEN THREE WEEKS AND FIFTY YEARS.AFTER WE HAD ASKED THEM THE QUESTIONS WE ASKED THEM TO SIGN THEIR NAMES.
